title: Question:
author: butshy
created_time: October 01, 2023, 02:49:52 PMLast edit: October 01, 2023, 04:16:29 PM by butshy
content: Selling Tiktok account with 6 thousand followersThis account was from my old online clothing storehas a lot of customers and a lot of engagementI'm selling because I decided to create a new business, which needs a different type of audience!Selling for $50

comments.author: Yamane_Keto
comments.body: Quote from: butshy on October 01, 2023, 02:49:52 PMThis account was from my old online clothing storehas a lot of customers and a lot of engagementSince it is a commercial account, showing the account data may be useful in helping you sell it, such as the percentage of new followers, the average number of views during the week or month, the average number of likes, the distribution of followers based on country or gender, and data related to the account, including the activity of followers and whether They were real followers or they were purchased.This data will help you sell the account or determine the appropriate price.
